name: My Personal World
description:
Main Concept:
If you bored at stay at home and you want to create your own Personal World you can do it with this game. Random objects spawn from up and every 15 minutes world gravity activates, you have to finish the your personal world before big time over.

How Play:
You go to an object near and press " E " then you can move it. In addition you probably want to use numlock 2,4,6,8,7,9 keys for rotation object which you catching.

Note:
If you have any problem about object moving just press " J " It will be reset the object.

Finally:
You can create your own world that no body knows, no body see before. If you can not go out just create a world in your computer your personal world.
